posts.title: Sonic Ugly Christmas Sweater
posts.content: Sonic has raced back from the depths of obscurity to spend the holidays with you in the form of this ugly Christmas sweater. Your favorite 8-bit hedgehog is ready to make his comeback and relive the glory days as he stands amid a winter wonderland.

posts.title: Faceless LED Watch
posts.content: Make your outfit pop by accessorizing with the eye-catching faceless LED watch. Instead of looking at a standard display, the watch’s bold design showcases the time right on the band itself for an understated yet modern look that is sure to get you noticed.

posts.title: Mini Strandbeest Model Kit
posts.content: If you’re struggling with what to get the tinkerer in your life for their upcoming birthday, feast your eyes on this unique Mini Strandbeest model kit. They’ll be able to construct a cool little moving kinetic sculpture that is powered solely by the wind.

posts.title: HDMI Pocket Projector
posts.content: Turn any location into your very own private cinema with the HDMI pocket projector. This compact and lightweight projector is capable of projecting clear images onto any smooth surface and is compatible with most smartphones via a USB cable.

posts.title: Fragrance Infusible Jewelry
posts.content: Get the most out of your fine and pricey fragrances by accenting your look with some fragrance infusible jewelry. The pendant can be infused with your favorite cologne or perfume in order to make it last approximately seven times longer.

posts.title: Instant Hook-up Water Hose Kit
posts.content: Leave those leaky brass spigots behind once and for all by upgrading your home with the instant hook-up water hose. It features a simple and leak-proof design that protects against sub-zero freeze and allows you to hook up your hose with a simple twist.

posts.title: Superdome Trampoline And Bouncer
posts.content: Video games and TV will fall by the wayside once your little monsters get a peek at this superdome trampoline and bouncer. It features a 360 degree net to prevent injuries and inflates in minutes to provide hours of enjoyment.

posts.title: Giant Blow Pop
posts.content: Say goodbye to your diet and hello to cavities! Nothing will satisfy your sweet tooth quite like this giant Blow Pop. This Blow Pop shaped container comes jam packed with an assortment of eight tasty Blow Pops that include flavors like watermelon, grape, and strawberry.

posts.title: LEGO Bugatti Chiron
posts.content: The super car of your dreams is within your reach! Developed in partnership with Bugatti Automobiles, this 3,599 piece set lets you build your very own 1:8 scale Bugatti Chiron with intricate and realistic detailing like a technic 8-speed gearbox with movable paddle gearshift.

posts.title: Does It Fart?
posts.content: Expand your repertoire of useless knowledge by becoming a foremost expert on animal flatulence by reading “Does It Fart?”. This fully illustrated field guide to animal flatulence covers the farting habits of 80 different animals including bats, zebras, and giraffes.

posts.title: Kano Computer Building & Coding Kit
posts.content: The Kano computer building and coding kit makes the perfect gift for any technologically inclined kid. This interactive kit teaches them how to build their very own Raspberry Pi 3 powered computer as well as how to code in languages like Python and Javascript.

posts.title: AK-47 Ice Bullets Tray
posts.content: Make your drink look dangerous with the AK-47 ice bullets tray. Just put in water, freeze, and shoot them straight into your favorite tumbler — these bullets will manly up even the girliest of drinks. Make it a killer party with ice designed to be deadly cold and delicious.
